fields.text: Welcome to Binti, where we build software in the East Bay to match every child with the best foster family.
For information about our foster care software and partnership opportunities, press [INDEX].
To learn about our child placement technology, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist in child placement technology.
To connect with our community partnership team, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our community partnership team.
If you are interested in becoming a foster parent or need support services, press [INDEX].
To find out how to become a foster parent, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our foster parent recruitment team.
For support services for current foster families, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to foster family support services.
